summary: Hitoshi:”I’m not trying to make friends here” Jirou, upon spotting his fob shirt: “Yeah. Anyways, whats your favourite song from...
caption:
Hitoshi:”I’m not trying to make friends here”
Jirou, upon spotting his fob shirt: “Yeah. Anyways, whats your favourite song from Under The Corktree,Nerd”

It’s the emo/punk/goth solidarity, Hitoshi might be trying to look like A Real Goth but theres Only 1 Goth in 1-A and thats Tokoyami. They may or may not end up chilling in Jirou’s room listening to Bad Religion

xoxo uwu

summary: Hey midoriya, Iida, Todoroki! When you wear street clothes, do you dress for comfort or looks?
question: Hey midoriya, Iida, Todoroki! When you wear street clothes, do you dress for comfort or looks?
answer:
Midoriya: “I try to dress comfortably. I’m also…not very good at styling, so I just choose what to wear based on how good it feels.”

Iida: “Practicality is important! I decide on my attire for the day based on a mixture of presentability and comfort!”

Todoroki: “I don’t pay a lot of attention to the clothes I wear. I like stuff that looks nice, but I wouldn’t wear anything that’s uncomfortable.”

Todoroki: “I don’t pay a lot of attention to the clothes I wear. I like stuff that looks nice, but I wouldn’t wear anything that’s uncomfortable.”

Todoroki: “I don’t pay a lot of attention to the clothes I wear. I like stuff that looks nice, but I wouldn’t wear anything that’s uncomfortable.”

summary: Hey Satania? Are you ever going to make a Q and A about yourself? I'd like to know more about you if you don't mind! I hope...
question: Hey Satania? Are you ever going to make a Q and A about yourself? I'd like to know more about you if you don't mind! I hope that's not weird lol.
answer:
mrsakabaka-karma asked: Oh sorry didn’t realize ask box was closed!

Hey, don’t worry about it! The ask box is still open if people have questions about me and the blog, so you’re totally fine.

Also, it sounds like fun and I would definitely want to do that, but I don’t know if many people would be interested, haha. I might do a Q&A/ask meme thing later on as a follower celebration or something, in addition to something else I have planned (shhh, it’s a secret!)

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: How about some headcanons of Todoroki, Uraraka, and Midoriya’s s/o turning into a 5 year old and they have to take care of them?
question: How about some headcanons of Todoroki, Uraraka, and Midoriya’s s/o turning into a 5 year old and they have to take care of them?
answer:
Sorry this took so long to post!!! It’s finally complete and I hope you enjoy!!


Todoroki:


-Todoroki genuinely didn’t know what to do! He usually was a cool, calm, collected person but seeing his S/O in a tiny child form from a stray quirk, they looked to be at least 5 years old.

-”Piggy back ride!” His S/O asked cutely, arms stretching up to him. Todoroki obliged, the child version of S/O slinged happily upon his back, arms strung around his neck but, luckily it wasn’t tight.

-Though how did one take care of a child? He didn’t exactly have the best frame of reference due to his upbringing. Maybe a few google searches would help out. Though wikihow only helped so much.

-Todoroki’s next idea was to then head back to the dorms, which he accomplished with a child S/O cheerfully singing atop his back.

-Next step was to feed them, since the whole walk to the dorms they complained about wanting for food. Though what do children eat? Do they eat special toddler food? Seconds later, S/O had their face full of cereal and Todoroki deemed it would be fine for them to eat since they weren’t currently dying whilst eating.

-They then insisted on watching t.v. and Todoroki felt forced to comply when they shot his a pair of begging puppy eyes. S/O sweetly thanked him before leaning against him when they sat on the couch, their eyes seemingly getting heavier before they started to snore lightly.

-An action movie played in the background and Todoroki’s thought that maybe having kids in the distant future may not be as bad as he once though it was.

-Before Todoroki knew it though, his lover turned back. Apologizing profusely for him having to take care of them. Though Todoroki smiled lightly before kissing them.



Uraraka:


-Uraraka prided herself on being good with children, since she used to babysit kids quite a bit. Though looking at a 5 year old version of her s/o was nothing that her babysitting skills could help with.

-Nervously she picked up her s/o in her arms, making sure to them tight since they were currently crying and a warm embrace fixed everything. First thing first was to head back to the dorms since the teachers would have a much better idea on how to take care of this situation then her.

-Since s/o kept weeping, Uraraka pulled out her wallet ad bought them an ice cream which rather quickly quieted before heading back to the dormitory

-“Thank you Urara! I love you!” Their face covered in sticky ice cream, they nuzzled their face against Uraraka covering her in the sticky substance as well.

-Uraraka smiled “Love you too. Now let’s clean up, shall we?” Ochaco ruffle their hair into a mess, giggling at their cute expression.

-To be honest after her initial nerves died down, she started to have fun with her s/o kid version. She took a ton of pictures as well to use to tease her lover when she went back to their normal age.

-Uraraka totally forgot about taking them to the dorms and decided she would go after a few more adventures with the child. The two strolled around the mall, with currently clean faces and happy smiles.

-Uraraka decided she might enjoy becoming a parent though would like her lover to turn back to their normal age and luckily that happened the next day!



Midoriya:


-How many panic attacks can one have when they look at their lover turned into a five year old. Many of them apparently. Midoriya held a tight grasp on their small hand as he felt ready to pass out.

-Was his lover stuck as a five year old forever? If not how long did the stray quirk last? Did they revert back to the mentality of a five year old or were they still as smart as a fifteen year old that was stuck in a much younger body?

-”Midi you ramble!” They laughed, and of course Midoriya said all of that out loud and a red blush crept up his freckled cheeks.

-Midoriya picked up his phone from his pocket and decided to dial Aizawa, since his teacher would most likely have the best course of action though he was just meet with a prerecorded message that went like this. “I’m not responding to any of my students since Ashido decided to prank call me in the dead of the night. Look if it’s an emergency, call All Might or my private phone number. I swear Ashido if you dial my private number, I will consider expelling you and make you write a 100 page essay on why you shouldn’t prank call people. Goodbye.”

-After that message, Midoriya decided to hold off on calling his teacher since he sounded extremely tired in the message. Picking up S/O in his arms, he forced an awkward smile “I guess it’s just me and you.”

-Their face lit up and the brightest smile was painted atop their lips “Yay, yay! We should get katsu, katsu.” Midoriya was quickly able to translate their sentence and they clearly desired to have katusdon, one of Midoriya’s favorite foods.

-Nervously they entered a restaurant and ordered their food,their face then proceed to be covered in food and Midoriya quickly wiped it off. Then suddenly poof! A cloud of smoke and they were back to their original form.

-”You’ll be a great father, Izuku!” And Midoriya then proceeded to turn as bright as a cherry and used his arms to cover his face.


I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

-Uraraka prided herself on being good with children, since she used to babysit kids quite a bit. Though looking at a 5 year old version of her s/o was nothing that her babysitting skills could help with.

-Nervously she picked up her s/o in her arms, making sure to them tight since they were currently crying and a warm embrace fixed everything. First thing first was to head back to the dorms since the teachers would have a much better idea on how to take care of this situation then her.

-Since s/o kept weeping, Uraraka pulled out her wallet ad bought them an ice cream which rather quickly quieted before heading back to the dormitory

-“Thank you Urara! I love you!” Their face covered in sticky ice cream, they nuzzled their face against Uraraka covering her in the sticky substance as well.

-Uraraka smiled “Love you too. Now let’s clean up, shall we?” Ochaco ruffle their hair into a mess, giggling at their cute expression.

-To be honest after her initial nerves died down, she started to have fun with her s/o kid version. She took a ton of pictures as well to use to tease her lover when she went back to their normal age.

-Uraraka totally forgot about taking them to the dorms and decided she would go after a few more adventures with the child. The two strolled around the mall, with currently clean faces and happy smiles.

-Uraraka decided she might enjoy becoming a parent though would like her lover to turn back to their normal age and luckily that happened the next day!



Midoriya:


-How many panic attacks can one have when they look at their lover turned into a five year old. Many of them apparently. Midoriya held a tight grasp on their small hand as he felt ready to pass out.

-Was his lover stuck as a five year old forever? If not how long did the stray quirk last? Did they revert back to the mentality of a five year old or were they still as smart as a fifteen year old that was stuck in a much younger body?

-”Midi you ramble!” They laughed, and of course Midoriya said all of that out loud and a red blush crept up his freckled cheeks.

-Midoriya picked up his phone from his pocket and decided to dial Aizawa, since his teacher would most likely have the best course of action though he was just meet with a prerecorded message that went like this. “I’m not responding to any of my students since Ashido decided to prank call me in the dead of the night. Look if it’s an emergency, call All Might or my private phone number. I swear Ashido if you dial my private number, I will consider expelling you and make you write a 100 page essay on why you shouldn’t prank call people. Goodbye.”

-After that message, Midoriya decided to hold off on calling his teacher since he sounded extremely tired in the message. Picking up S/O in his arms, he forced an awkward smile “I guess it’s just me and you.”

-Their face lit up and the brightest smile was painted atop their lips “Yay, yay! We should get katsu, katsu.” Midoriya was quickly able to translate their sentence and they clearly desired to have katusdon, one of Midoriya’s favorite foods.

-Nervously they entered a restaurant and ordered their food,their face then proceed to be covered in food and Midoriya quickly wiped it off. Then suddenly poof! A cloud of smoke and they were back to their original form.

-”You’ll be a great father, Izuku!” And Midoriya then proceeded to turn as bright as a cherry and used his arms to cover his face.


I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

tags: chimi does so much better at writing mirio but they asked me to try writing them something for him
so I did and this happened
mirio is the polar opposite of my usual characters yall
like gdi I play dabi in the bnha groups I'm in with chi I struggle at writing heroes for bnha
but I am quite proud of this writing piece still
I hope you guys enjoyed it!!
I just wanted to post it because actual content
summary: “As Luck Would Have It” - Life In Color - BNHA - Mirio
title: “As Luck Would Have It” - Life In Color - BNHA - Mirio
body:
Okay, so here’s the thing, guys: this was written as a sort of challenge. I know I mentioned I had started a new group, one for bnha. Well, my friend who’s playing admin for me (because if I try to manage this alone I will Actually go insane with how bad I am at decisions) decided to issue the challenge to me last night to write for their character - Mirio. 

There was no set space or time that I needed to focus on, just “try writing something for Mirio!” because my energy levels were quite high last night. 

And this was the result. It was written to “As Luck Would Have It” by Gold Steps, in about five minutes last night at about 10 pm my time. I’m not quite as fond of it as I am of some of my other works, but I still wanted to share it. That said, please enjoy!

Confidence hadn’t always been something that had come easily to Mirio - at least, not like most people seemed to think. 

Sure, he’d been able to emit confidence like no one’s business from a young age, but there had always been just the smallest bit of doubt holding him back. It wasn’t something he was proud of, and it wasn’t something he showed to people. 

Even those closest to him - hell, he wasn’t sure he’d ever even shown Tamaki that weakness. 

Before now, anyway. 

But what was he supposed to do? He hadn’t gone into the issue with Overhaul thinking he’d come out of it missing a core part of who he’d been trying to become. 

Yet here he was, back in the vicious cycle of well maybe I really can’t do this that he’d fought so hard with growing up and working on his quirk. 

It had never been something he had banked many of his decisions on once Tamaki came into his life - quite by force, considering Mirio’s open and friendly nature even as a kid. 

But now, it was the only thing he could think of as he tried to find some kind of good in the situation. Some kind of foothold so he didn’t backslide away from all the progress he’d made over the years. 

And really, his friends were blessing in that aspect, but it wasn’t quite enough to breakthrough his own thoughts - quirkless people couldn’t be heroes. It just didn’t happen. So what now?

He’d almost talked himself out of trying to find a work around to keep going into heroics when Tamaki showed up to visit him again - every day, just like clockwork, something that was more than a little endearing. 

The good thing is, Tamaki had seen him at his weakest by this point, so he could talk to him, right? Bounce ideas off someone without worry of getting laughed at.

Plus, Tamaki was the grounded one of the two of them, realistic in a way that Mirio needed when it involved himself and his plans. 

That was a comfort. Not quite enough to set him back into his usual cheerfulness completely, but it made him feel more normal. 

I wonder if he’ll ever know just how much of a life saver he is, he thought absently halfway through their talk that night.

At least, he figured, this way the darkness that had been threatening to consume his thoughts wasn’t so daunting. He wasn’t alone, so he knew he stood a chance at figuring this out before he could convince himself to give up. That was better than nothing.
